rows.name: text_not_completed
rows.value:
Hi @global.user_name, a new workshop awaits you tomorrow. It seems like you haven’t finished the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title yet. It’s really a short one (promise!) – you can even complete it while waiting for dinner to cook. Why don’t you go through it when you have a few minutes? 

Thank you again for using @global.parent_app.

rows.name: text_completed
rows.value: Great that you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new workshop is unlocked. Try it - you will see the difference in your teen’s behaviour.
